titles.title: Equity in Fertility Coverage Act of 2000

To assure equitable treatment of fertility and impotence in health care coverage under group health plans, health insurance coverage, and health plans under the Federal employees' health benefits program.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Education and the Workforce, and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Education and the Workforce
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

bill.summary: 5/24/2000--Introduced. Equity in Fertility Coverage Act of 2000 - Amends the Public Health Service Act, the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, and Federal law provisions concerning the Federal employees's health benefits program to require health plans covering impotency medications such as viagra to also cover fertility treatments.
